short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that removes egirls from your Twitter feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open-Source on Github: https://github.com/GODrums/minus-egirls

Minus-Egirls removes egirls from your Twitter / X feed, conversations and the comment section. By selecing one of the 3 filter strength levels, you can choose yourself how much you want to filter out.

Highlights:
- for twitter.com / x.com
- On/Off-Option
- 3 filter strength levels

This extension is still in active development. There may still be bugs or missing features. For feature suggestions or bug reports join our Discord, which can be found in the extension popup or the Github repository: https://github.com/GODrums/minus-egirls
If you are an experienced coder, feel free to contribute on Github.
